36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Indeed among the excellence of a person's Islam is that he leaves what does not concern him

chapter.eng-name: Among The Excellence Of A Person's Islam Is His Leaving What Does Not Concern Him
